function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 among construction workers due to close physical proximity","Impact":"Increased risk of illness, project delays, and loss of productivity","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict social distancing measures, providing personal protective equipment, and regular testing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, automated temperature screening, and remote monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, site managers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, site management teams"},{"Description":"Delays in project execution due to limitations on the number of workers allowed on construction sites","Impact":"Financial stress, project delays, and legal issues related to contractual clauses","Mitigation":"Implementing staggered work shifts, utilizing technology for remote supervision, and improving communication between stakeholders","Technologies":"Project management software, remote monitoring systems, and communication platforms","People":"Project managers, site managers, construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies, project management teams"},{"Description":"Disruption of the economic recovery of nations due to impacts on construction industry","Impact":"Economic downturn, unemployment, and reduced infrastructure development","Mitigation":"Government financial support, infrastructure investment, and policy incentives for construction projects","Technologies":"Digital permitting systems, construction automation technology, and remote project planning tools","People":"Government officials, policymakers, construction industry leaders","Owner":"Government bodies, construction industry associations"}]}
